name: R.O.Y
description:
Info:

R.O.Y is a minimalistic top-down runner where your track is your own life and collectable items are events happening with you during lifetime.

There are many types of events. From tiny little things to life-changing.

  • Every event in the game has obvious or unintended consequences. 
  • Your character parameters and skills also affects on events that can happen.
  • Time speeds up the older you get (just like in real life) increasing the game difficulty.
  • There are some hidden mechanics that you will discover at decent character's age. So do not surprise :)

The game has no a distinct goal. The honor to come up with it is presented to you. Die young or live a long life. Become a criminal or astronaut or even an elected president!

Have fun!

Controls:
  • Move character - LEFT / RIGHT or A / D
  • Skip event - ENTER or SPACE or Click on Button 
  • Interact with buttons - Left Mouse Button Click
Warning!

The game is in development. Only RU language is supported at the moment. And the content stated in the description may be partially missing. (I mean "become a criminal or president" etc.) :) Mechanics are fully implemented. Only day-by-day mode (longer session time) is currently unavailable due the lack of content.
